languages.text: "Нас связывало многое. Арнульф был моим побратимом. От его клинка я пал в битве, где меня заметил Избирающий доблестных, от моего топора погиб и он в том сражении. Но позже мы забыли вражду наших кланов и стали близкими друзьями". {n}Ульфар показывает нож, покрытый красными рунами.{/n} "Этот клинок он подарил мне в знак того, что прошлое забыто. Скор на смех был Арнульф и страшен в драке, почти как я сам".

"The bonds between us were many. Arnoolf was my sworn brother. It was he whom I faced down in the battle where the Chooser of the Valiant noticed me. Arnoolf too was deemed worthy. We went from bitter foes to setting aside the enmity between our clans and becoming close friends." {n}Ulfar shows you a blade covered in red runes.{/n} "He gave me this blade to show that the past was forgotten. Quick to laugh was Arnoolf, and fearsome in a fight, almost as fearsome as me."
languages.original_text: "Нас связывало многое. Арнульф был моим побратимом. От его клинка я пал в битве, где меня заметил Избирающий доблестных, от моего топора погиб и он в том сражении. Но позже мы забыли вражду наших кланов и стали близкими друзьями". {n}Ульфар показывает нож, покрытый красными рунами.{/n} "Этот клинок он подарил мне в знак того, что прошлое забыто. Скор на смех был Арнульф и страшен в драке, почти как я сам".

traits.locale_text: "The bonds between us were many. Arnoolf was my sworn brother. It was his blade that felled me in the battle where the Chooser of the Valiant noticed me. It was my axe that felled Arnoolf in that same exchange. But later we forgot the enmity between our clans and became close friends." {n}Ulfar shows you a blade covered in red runes.{/n} "He gave me this blade to show that the past was forgotten. Quick to laugh was Arnoolf, and fearsome in a fight, almost as fearsome as me."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The bonds between us were many. Arnoolf was my sworn brother. It was his blade that felled me in the battle where the Chooser of the Valiant noticed me. It was my axe that felled Arnoolf in that same exchange. But later we forgot the enmity between our clans and became close friends." {n}Ulfar shows you a blade covered in red runes.{/n} "He gave me this blade to show that the past was forgotten. Quick to laugh was Arnoolf, and fearsome in a fight, almost as fearsome as me."

It was my axe that felled Arnoolf in that same exchange. But later we forgot the enmity between our clans and became close friends." {n}Ulfar shows you a blade covered in red runes.{/n} "He gave me this blade to show that the past was forgotten. Quick to laugh was Arnoolf, and fearsome in a fight, almost as fearsome as me."

traits.locale_text: "The bonds between us were many. Arnoolf was my sworn brother. It was he whom I faced down in the battle where the Chooser of the Valiant noticed me. Arnoolf too was deemed worthy. We went from bitter foes to setting aside the enmity between our clans and becoming close friends." {n}Ulfar shows you a blade covered in red runes.{/n} "He gave me this blade to show that the past was forgotten. Quick to laugh was Arnoolf, and fearsome in a fight, almost as fearsome as me."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Nos unían numerosos lazos. Arnoolf era mi hermano de juramento. Fue mi oponente en la batalla en la que el Elector de los Valientes se fijó en mí, y también fue elegido en esa misma contienda. Pasamos de ser enemigos a olvidar la enemistad entre nuestros clanes y hacernos grandes amigos». {n}Ulfar te enseña una hoja cubierta de runas rojas.{/n} «Me dio esta hoja para demostrar que el pasado quedaba atrás. Arnoolf era jovial y temible en combate. Casi tan temible como yo».
languages.original_text: "The bonds between us were many. Arnoolf was my sworn brother. It was he whom I faced down in the battle where the Chooser of the Valiant noticed me. Arnoolf too was deemed worthy. We went from bitter foes to setting aside the enmity between our clans and becoming close friends." {n}Ulfar shows you a blade covered in red runes.{/n} "He gave me this blade to show that the past was forgotten. Quick to laugh was Arnoolf, and fearsome in a fight, almost as fearsome as me."

traits.locale_text: «Nos unían numerosos lazos. Arnoolf era mi hermano de juramento. Fue su hoja la que me abatió en la batalla en la que el Elector de los Valientes se fijó en mí, y mi hacha la que acabó con él en esa misma contienda. Pero más adelante olvidamos la enemistad entre nuestros clanes y nos hicimos grandes amigos». {n}Ulfar te enseña una hoja cubierta de runas rojas.{/n} «Me dio esta hoja para demostrar que el pasado quedaba atrás. Arnoolf era jovial y temible en combate. Casi tan temible como yo».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “我们之间有许多羁绊，阿努尔夫是我的结拜兄弟。在我引起甄勇者注意的那场战斗中，我面对的敌人正是阿努尔夫，而他也被甄勇者选中了。我们原本是宿敌，后来我们渐渐忘掉了氏族之间的仇恨，成为了亲密的战友。”{n}乌尔法拿出了一把满是红色符文的利刃。{/n}“这把刀是他给我的礼物，代表过去的一切一笔勾销。阿努尔夫笑起来很爽朗，战斗的时候也很勇猛，几乎和我一样勇猛。”
languages.original_text: "The bonds between us were many. Arnoolf was my sworn brother. It was he whom I faced down in the battle where the Chooser of the Valiant noticed me. Arnoolf too was deemed worthy. We went from bitter foes to setting aside the enmity between our clans and becoming close friends." {n}Ulfar shows you a blade covered in red runes.{/n} "He gave me this blade to show that the past was forgotten. Quick to laugh was Arnoolf, and fearsome in a fight, almost as fearsome as me."

traits.locale_text: “我们之间有许多羁绊，阿努尔夫是我的结拜兄弟。在我引起甄勇者注意的那场战斗中，是阿努尔夫的刀砍倒了我，但也是在那场战斗中，我的斧头砍倒了他。后来，我们忘掉了氏族之间的仇恨，成为了好朋友。”{n}乌尔法拿出了一把满是红色符文的利刃。{/n}“这把刀是他给了我，对过去的一切一笔勾销。阿努尔夫笑起来很爽朗，打起架来也很可怕，几乎和我一样可怕。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「俺たちの間にはいくつもの絆があった。アーノルフは俺の兄弟分だ。勇者の選者が俺を見つけた、あの戦いで対峙したのもアイツだった。アーノルフも価値を認められたのさ。俺達は敵対するのをやめて、一族同士の敵対関係を脇に置き、親しい友人になった」{n}ウルファーは赤いルーンで覆われた刃を見せる。{/n}「アイツは過去は水に流そうと、俺にこの刃をくれた。戦いでは俺と同じくらい凶悪なアーノルフが笑ったんだぜ」
languages.original_text: "The bonds between us were many. Arnoolf was my sworn brother. It was he whom I faced down in the battle where the Chooser of the Valiant noticed me. Arnoolf too was deemed worthy. We went from bitter foes to setting aside the enmity between our clans and becoming close friends." {n}Ulfar shows you a blade covered in red runes.{/n} "He gave me this blade to show that the past was forgotten. Quick to laugh was Arnoolf, and fearsome in a fight, almost as fearsome as me."

traits.locale_text: 「俺たちの間にはたくさんの絆があった。アーノルフと俺は誓いで結ばれた兄弟だった。勇者の選者が俺の存在に気づいた戦いで俺を倒したのは、彼の刃だった。同じ状況でアーノルフを倒したのは俺の斧だった。だが後に、俺たちは一族間の対立を水に流し、親しい友となった」{n}ウルファーは赤いルーンで覆われた刃を見せる。{/n}「彼は過去を水に流したことを示すため、俺にこの刃をくれた。戦いでは俺と同じくらい恐ろしかったアーノルフが笑ったんだ」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Nombreux étaient les liens qui nous unissaient. Arnoolf était mon frère d'armes. C'est lui que j'ai affronté lors de la bataille au cours de laquelle le Sélecteur des Vaillants m'a remarqué. Lui aussi a été jugé digne, ce jour-là. À la longue, nous avons oublié les rivalités de nos clans respectifs et nous sommes devenus des amis proches. » {n}Ulfar vous montre une lame couverte de runes rouges.{/n} « Il m'a donné cette arme en gage de réconciliation. Ce bon vieil Arnoolf avait toujours le mot pour rire et il faisait un combattant redoutable, presque autant que moi. »
languages.original_text: "The bonds between us were many. Arnoolf was my sworn brother. It was he whom I faced down in the battle where the Chooser of the Valiant noticed me. Arnoolf too was deemed worthy. We went from bitter foes to setting aside the enmity between our clans and becoming close friends." {n}Ulfar shows you a blade covered in red runes.{/n} "He gave me this blade to show that the past was forgotten. Quick to laugh was Arnoolf, and fearsome in a fight, almost as fearsome as me."

traits.locale_text: « Nombreux étaient les liens qui nous unissaient. Arnoolf était mon frère d'armes. C'est sous sa lame que je suis tombé lors de la bataille au cours de laquelle le Sélecteur des Vaillants m'a remarqué. Et c'est ma hache qui l'a abattu en retour ce jour-là. Mais plus tard, nous avons oublié les rivalités de nos clans respectifs et nous sommes devenus des amis proches. {n}Ulfar vous montre une lame couverte de runes rouges.{/n} Il m'a donné cette arme en gage de réconciliation. Ce bon vieux Arnoolf avait toujours le mot pour rire, et il faisait un combattant redoutable, presque autant que moi. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Der Bindungen zwischen uns gab es viele. Arnoolf war mein Eidbruder. Ihm begegnete ich in der Schlacht, als der Erwähler der Tapferen mich bemerkte. Arnoolf wurde auch für würdig befunden. Aus bitterer Feindschaft zwischen unseren Clans wurde enge Freundschaft." {n}Ulfar zeigt dir eine Klinge, die mit roten Runen bedeckt ist.{/n} "Er hat mir diese Klinge gegeben, um zu zeigen, dass die Vergangenheit vergessen ist. Viel gelacht hat Arnoolf, und er war furchterregend im Kampf, fast so furchterregend wie ich."
languages.original_text: "The bonds between us were many. Arnoolf was my sworn brother. It was he whom I faced down in the battle where the Chooser of the Valiant noticed me. Arnoolf too was deemed worthy. We went from bitter foes to setting aside the enmity between our clans and becoming close friends." {n}Ulfar shows you a blade covered in red runes.{/n} "He gave me this blade to show that the past was forgotten. Quick to laugh was Arnoolf, and fearsome in a fight, almost as fearsome as me."

traits.locale_text: "Der Bindungen zwischen uns gab es viele. Arnoolf war mein Eidbruder. Es war seine Klinge, die mich in dem Kampf niederstreckte, in dem der Erwähler der Tapferen mich bemerkte. Es war meine Axt, die Arnoolf im selben Kampf niederstreckte. Doch später vergaßen wir die Feindschaft zwischen unseren Clans und wurden enge Freunde." {n}Ulfar zeigt dir eine Klinge, die mit roten Runen bedeckt ist.{/n} "Er hat mir diese Klinge gegeben, um zu zeigen, dass die Vergangenheit vergessen ist. Viel gelacht hat Arnoolf, und er war furchterregend im Kampf, fast so furchterregend wie ich."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "The bonds between us were many. Arnoolf was my sworn brother. It was he whom I faced down in the battle where the Chooser of the Valiant noticed me. Arnoolf too was deemed worthy. We went from bitter foes to setting aside the enmity between our clans and becoming close friends." {n}Ulfar shows you a blade covered in red runes.{/n} "He gave me this blade to show that the past was forgotten. Quick to laugh was Arnoolf, and fearsome in a fight, almost as fearsome as me."

languages.text: "Aramızda birçok bağ vardı. Arnoolf benim yeminli kardeşimdi. Yiğit Seçen'in beni fark ettiği savaşta yüzleştiğim oydu. Arnoolf da layık görülmüştü. Küskün düşmanlardık ama klanlarımız arasındaki husumeti bir kenara bırakıp yakın dost olabildik." {n}Ulfar, sana kırmızı rünlerle kaplı bir bıçak gösteriyor.{/n} "Bu bıçağı bana geçmişi unuttuğunu kanıtlamak için vermişti. Arnoolf pek güleç biriydi ama savaşta en az benim kadar korkunçtu."
languages.original_text: "The bonds between us were many. Arnoolf was my sworn brother. It was he whom I faced down in the battle where the Chooser of the Valiant noticed me. Arnoolf too was deemed worthy. We went from bitter foes to setting aside the enmity between our clans and becoming close friends." {n}Ulfar shows you a blade covered in red runes.{/n} "He gave me this blade to show that the past was forgotten. Quick to laugh was Arnoolf, and fearsome in a fight, almost as fearsome as me."

traits.locale_text: "Aramızda birçok bağ vardı. Arnoolf benim yeminli kardeşimdi. Yiğitlerin Seçicisi'nin beni fark ettiği savaşta yüzleştiğim oydu. Arnoolf da layık görülmüştü. Küskün düşmanlardık ama klanlarımız arasındaki husumeti bir kenara bırakıp yakın dost olduk." {n}Ulfar, sana kırmızı rünlerle kaplı bir bıçak gösteriyor.{/n} "Bu bıçağı bana geçmişi unuttuğunu kanıtlamak için vermişti. Arnoolf pek güleç biriydi ama savaşta en az benim kadar korkunçtu."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
